about_the_game:
Cosmo 02 is an exhilarating bullet hell and fixed shooter game that immerses you in the role of a skilled space soldier. Your objective is to single-handedly annihilate entire fleets of opponents, demonstrating your prowess and determination in the face of overwhelming odds. As you venture through the game, you will confront four formidable admirals who command the space army. These adversaries pose a significant challenge, requiring you to employ strategic thinking and masterful reflexes to overcome their defenses.

Traverse the vast expanse of the galaxy, encountering a multitude of shuttles and exploring stunning celestial landscapes. Along the way, collect various bonuses that can bolster your survival chances or amplify your destructive capabilities, enabling you to dispatch enemies with greater efficiency. Prepare for relentless battles as you navigate through an onslaught of enemy projectiles, treacherous asteroid fields, and menacing alien vessels. Dodging and weaving through the chaos is crucial, as a single mistake can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

Features
  • Intense Bullet Hell Action: Cosmo 02 delivers heart-pounding, fast-paced gameplay filled with a barrage of bullets and projectiles. Engage in thrilling battles where your reflexes and agility will be put to the ultimate test.
  • Challenging Boss Fights: Prepare to face off against four powerful admirals of the space army in epic boss battles. Each admiral presents unique strategies and formidable attacks, requiring careful planning and skillful execution to emerge victorious.
  • Vast Galaxy Exploration: Embark on a captivating journey through a vast galaxy, encountering diverse shuttles and breathtaking celestial environments. Immerse yourself in the wonders of space as you navigate through visually stunning and intricately designed levels.
  • Strategic Power-ups and Bonuses: Discover and collect a wide array of power-ups and bonuses that can enhance your abilities and increase your chances of survival. Choose wisely and strategically utilize these bonuses to unleash devastating attacks and overcome challenging obstacles.
  • Immersive Visuals and Engaging Storyline: Immerse yourself in a visually striking world with detailed graphics and captivating visual effects. The game features an engaging storyline that unfolds as you progress, keeping you invested in the narrative as you strive to achieve your goal of defeating the space army and restoring peace to the galaxy.

Your objective is to single-handedly annihilate entire fleets of opponents, demonstrating your prowess and determination in the face of overwhelming odds. These adversaries pose a significant challenge, requiring you to employ strategic thinking and masterful reflexes to overcome their defenses.

Traverse the vast expanse of the galaxy, encountering a multitude of shuttles and exploring stunning celestial landscapes. name: Cosmo 02

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel quad-core 2.0 GHz or dual-core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 5700
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or amd Radeon HD 8000 series
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: Cosmo 02 is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter where you play as a space soldier, destroying enemy fleets, defeating bosses, and collecting power-ups in a stunning galaxy.
